reviews.review: Pretty fun game, more fun with friends. Gets really sweaty at higher ranks, but that's to be expected I guess.

I mean, okay it's repetitive gameplay, but what isn't these days really? It's a fun game and if you have a couple friends to play with it can be a really great time. Your first time playing will get your heart racing no matter who you are.

Killers are completely overpowered. There is no voice chat between your teammates so you don't know if your team mates are doing anything.  Mori allows killers to end games within 5 min if they know what they are doing. Wouldn't suggest purchacing until balancing is fixed you are wasting your time and money if you want to play by yourself and enjoy the game.

A totally fun game to play if you're looking to pass the time. A nice blend of Horror and Thriller that totally makes your heart constantly pumping with excitement leaving you at the edge of your seat! Keep your eyes open or else you'll be the next victim!!
This game is fantastic. I love getting hit through pallets, dead hard-ing on the floor, and getting tbagged as killer. I would play this all day.

Great game to play with friends! Playing with a random group of people can be fun too! Great jump scares and suspense. For best gameplay and thrill experience, play at night and in the dark with headphones.

It's a good game overall, but there are some balance issues on both sides (killer and survivor) that will sometimes lead to anger. It's got a bit of a skill curve as well, but that's not really a critique. Just don't expect to be amazing at this game after a few hours.

My feeling is mixed up actually because it is BUGGY.  I like the game, but I can't play with my friends. We tried custom game with 5 people, can't make it. Then we tried with 4 in survivor mode with a random killer assigned, we could play. But I WASTED half of my playing time in the game lobby. I don't receive invitations properly. My fiends had to invite me from steam itself, but I have to restart it every time.  Otherwise, either I can't see my friends, or their ready tick mark even if they pushed it, or I can't pass to the next lobby before the game starts. They join the game without me and I kicked out or have to exit and restart the game. I hope this is solved soon, before everybody gets bored. They already got sick of waiting for me and they stop playin as well. Loosing the appetite !!!!
el mejor juego que jugue bro
800h und das Spiel macht immer noch Spa√ü au√üer die Hitboxen von Huntress

Overall I find the game enjoyable and fun to play, but the recent changes to matchmaking have made it very difficult to enjoy playing killer. I took a break of several months from this game because of the infinites and an innate favor towards the survivor role. These have been addressed to varying degrees but now there is a way to manipulate the poor matchmaking system that is currently in place. Red ranked SWF groups can pair with a brown rank or green, etc. and get placed in a match with killers of that lower rank. Its not even averaged, the lowest ranked survivor dictates the level of the killer you get placed with, making it incredibly difficult to level up killers unless you have hundreds of thousands of BPs saved up so that you can have perks and add-ons ready to go to compete at red ranks. In the other sense, it destroys the ability of killer mains to learn new killers without getting destroyed by survivor mains in every game. I don't play this game religiously or competitively, bu I would like to have enjoyable games where the skill levels are comparable to make for an interesting game, but the current matchmaking environment does not allow for that in most games.

A really fun game, but no balance and terrible, very terrible hitboxes. Play only killer if you want fun or if you play as survivor know EVERY looping point in the game. Otherwise you don't have a chance and when you are camped gg. Also they buffed Buba he has now 3 stacks with his chainsaw, yeah.... stupid character with zero skill.

Hey, it's a lot of fun. 

Buy it.

Most of your matches will be spent holding down or spamming the same button in QTE style, hoping that RNGesus won't screw you over when you vault over something and there's a little latency. That said, the inherent clunkiness is part of its charm and the showcase of familiar horror villains keeps the entertainment and creep factor alive.
